alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 11:43AM CST until January 23 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas, including the following counties, Lafayette and Miller, northwest Louisiana, including the following parish, Caddo, and northeast Texas, including the following counties, Cass and Marion. * WHEN...Until 245 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1143 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Atlanta, Vivian, Linden, Queen City, Rodessa, Ida, Bivins, McLeod, Kildare, Ravanna, Lodi, Smithland, Brightstar, Fairview, Avinger, Bloomburg, Domino, Red Hill, Pruett and Kiblah. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
